/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from under a concrete overpass, providing a unique view of the city's infrastructure. The overpass, with its curved arches, frames the street below, creating a sense of depth and scale. 

The street itself is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and bicycles are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the daily life and movement in this part of Beijing.

In the distance, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting different parts of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the overpass and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
